item.description:
Spend the day changing your life!

This one day retreat is for you if you would like to increase your self esteem, develop your self-confidence, enhance your spirituality or just want to feel better about yourself and your life.

Get ready to become aware of your past accomplishments, discover that you are capable of living a happier more fulfilling life, and gain more peace.

No matter where you are in your life right now, you will benefit from this one day retreat of writing, reading, sharing, and listening. You will leave rejuvenated and excited about your life! You will even feel lighter!

For more details and other upcoming retreats, join my other meetup group: http://www.meetup.com/rejuvenating-retreats














Please note that we will be meeting upstairs in the loft. There are no elevators, so the only way to the meeting area are the stairs. If you are unable to climb stairs, please wait and sign up for the next one at a different location.
item.name: Rejuvenating One Day Retreat
